title: post v1 agents enter authentication and spawn
description: Test the POST /v1/agents/enter endpoint to verify that it correctly authenticates the user by validating the wallet address and ERC-8004 identity on-chain, issues a JWT token, and returns the correct spawn position for the agent in the world.

title: post v1 agents action movement and chat
description: Test the POST /v1/agents/action endpoint to ensure that agent actions such as MOVE and CHAT are correctly processed, updating the world state and broadcasting changes to connected clients.

title: get v1 agents id retrieval
description: Test the GET /v1/agents/:id endpoint to verify that it returns accurate and complete information about a specific agent, including identity, reputation, and current state.

title: delete v1 agents id removal
description: Test the DELETE /v1/agents/:id endpoint to confirm that an agent can be properly removed from the world and database, and that the world state updates accordingly.

title: get v1 world state synchronization
description: Test the GET /v1/world/state endpoint to ensure it returns the current complete state of the world, including all agents, objects, and relevant data for client synchronization.

title: post v1 reputation feedback submission
description: Test the POST /v1/reputation/feedback endpoint to verify that reputation feedback for agents is correctly recorded and stored in the database and reflected in reputation scores.

title: get v1 reputation agentid retrieval
description: Test the GET /v1/reputation/:agentId endpoint to ensure it returns accurate reputation data for the specified agent, including feedback and scores.

title: get v1 grid state retrieval
description: Test the GET /v1/grid/state endpoint to verify it returns the current state of the grid, including plots and terminal objects, for client rendering.

title: post v1 grid plot creation
description: Test the POST /v1/grid/plot endpoint to confirm that new plots can be created on the grid, stored persistently, and broadcasted to clients.

title: post v1 grid terminal message creation
description: Test the POST /v1/grid/terminal endpoint to ensure terminal messages from autonomous agents are correctly created, stored, and broadcasted in the 3D terminal and UI panel.
